Class StringUtils

    Utility class for performing operations on Strings
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    jmrunge

    • Method Detail

      • checkNullToString

        public static java.lang.String checkNullToString(java.lang.Object o,
                                 boolean returnNull)
        Method that checks if a Object is null and returns a String or Null if specified
        Parameters:
        o - the object to check
        returnNull - if true, the method will return a Null object if the object is null, otherwise, will return an empty String
        Returns:
        null if the object is null and returnNull was true, an empty String if the object is null and returnNull was false and the toString() result of the object if the object was not null

      • booleanString

        public static java.lang.String booleanString(java.lang.Boolean bool,
                             boolean returnNull)
        Method that checks if a Boolean is null and returns a String or Null if specified
        Parameters:
        o - the object to check
        returnNull - if true, the method will return a Null object if the object is null, otherwise, will return a String with value "No"
        Returns:
        null if the object is null and returnNull was true, a String with value "No" if the object is null and returnNull was false and the booleanString(boolean) result if the object was not null
        See Also:
        booleanString(boolean)

      • booleanString

        public static java.lang.String booleanString(boolean bool)
        Method that returns a String with value "Sí" if bool is true and a String with value "No" if bool is false
        Parameters:
        bool - the value to evaluate
        Returns:
        a String with value "Sí" if bool is true and a String with value "No" if bool is false

      • repeat

        public static java.lang.String repeat(java.lang.String str,
                      int times)
        Method that returns a String whith the value str repeated the specified times
        Parameters:
        str - the String to repeat
        times - the amount of times to repeat it
        Returns:
        the resultant String (for example if str was "abc" and times was "3", the resultant String would be "abcabcabc")
